subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Liang Wenchong of China stunned onlookers by breezing to an eight-under 64 and breaking the Whistling Straits course record by a stroke.
snippet: Liang Wenchong of China stunned onlookers by breezing to an eight-under 64 and breaking the Whistling Straits course record by a stroke.
